title: LeaveBuster
body:
I've had problems since the last update. My client crashes and i got low priority que. This has happened with previous updates and it doesnt matter if i send a screen shot it showing the client screwing up. And ive had friends that have the same problem.  

Come on Riot be reasonable. Especially during the first week of a new update the bugs are everywhere.
